members.name: getPackageName
members.comment: Returns the name of the package to be exported.

return: the name of the package to be exported

members.name: getModuleNames
members.comment: Returns the names of the modules to which the package is exported, or null, if the package is exported to all modules.

return: the names of the modules to which the package is exported, or null

name: com.sun.source.tree.ExportsTree
